review: I really like this little device but don't buy if you're wanting a streaming player as main entertainment. I use a Roku, Fire TV would also be good. This is ONLY a mirror device which is the BEAST solution for PC to TV mirroring, and chrome tab casting. You can play any video to your TV which is awesome for the stuff unavailable on typical streaming devices, such as HBO Now (now on android). But, this is not as good for watching Netflix, hulu, etc. as you have to link your phone between casts which can cause lag between episodes, battery drain, etc.
